message.body: Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse. My fave
So good! Love it heh
Hehehe watches
Heheh yup we rule :) thanks so much again dear! I love it heh
Eeee I'm just so happy it looks so good on you and thank you love it Johnny (:
It looks great! And glad :) mrah I want huggles. How're you? Home btw heh
￼The bottoms are too small though on my ass and crotxh
And aww me too, come back ):
Sexy you mean ;) gift receipt? And I want to heh. Check insty :)
Awwww Johnny!! (: hehe you rule so much! And sexy? What? No but there are tags. And come back!! Heheh no jk I'll see you tomorrow eeee
Yeah tmrw soon :) and oh well Hmph we can return dem! And you can get danks. Well sexy cuz they tite heh.
Haha ohh yeah they are like my vagina can't breathe :P but yeah we can figure it out! Ain't a thang! How're you?
Netflix isn't working...
It isn't? Bummer... Hulu? And hahah well that's not good. We can return em lovey! An I'm good :) gonna sleepy soon heheh
Meh idk why :/ yeah we shall. And yeah we should both sleepy but I need to watch something before I sleep without you
Oh okie, Hmph Netflix still ain't working? Maybe project free lovey?
Nope just got it! Whoot! In bed all happy heh. You in bed yet?
Yeah just got in bed and brushed my teeth hehe :) need to warm up with out you!
Hah I know right? Can't wait to sleep happy again tomorrow night babe(: it's the best ree
Yup def th best and the nicest :) love it so mch and I sleep so well too!
It's really my favorite thing ever Johnny, best feeling. And me too, like forever! Sleep for the longest time! Let you sleep babe?
Yup straight up hehe :) and yeah dear. Obicham te and thanks again! Merry Xmas and sleep well my lovey :)
I love you too babe, so much. Sweet dreams lovey (:
￼Bella's mountain of presents hah. Merry Xmas lovey :)
Oh my god!! Merry Christmas darling, I hope it's going altight!
Yeah it's good :) hope you slept well lovey
Meh not really, bad dreams but all good. How are presents going?
They good, lotsa warm clothes and such. Nothing beats yours :) I'm sowy lovey mrah
Aww that's good! Getting stuff is fun fun hehe (: surfing later or wassup?
Uh idk, Erik is he said its pumping but I'm feeling too lazy. Plus he's gonna surf some gnarly la jolla reefs ya know. And def nice :) miss you lovey
Ah yeah don't do gnarly la jolla reefs :P miss you too babe, wanna be with you already. Do you know when linner is?
Idk when it is, maybe around 3 or so? I'll figure it out. When's yours? Might be able to visit eh
Mines at 2 I'm pretty sure, and what do you mean?
Is it just Bella present time?
Hah no we all just finished pretty much. My mother loved the flying mermaid heh and my dad liked the book! And I wana visit chu
Ohh like before my lunch?! And yay that's good, I'm happy they did
I wanna go to catchy jean and grab the black combat boots I wanted
Yeah? Would that work? And okay we can do that heh! I got a UO and American apparel giftcard. Shopping day heh
Haha okay, hold on lemme ask
Yeah you can but were like leaving around 145 prlly so you should come ASAP
Oh okay for sho. Well that's sometime to chill heh. Yeah idk what the plan is now
What do you mean? What the plan is now? Sorry idk just tell me if you're coming or not cuz like you keep getting my hopes up and it's annoying :/
Oh I'll come lovey! Just Dk exactly when yet. Think Erik might give me a ride home inna bit before he surfs heh
Okie well we gotta clean right now and then I gotta shower so if you don't mind that
Nope that's all good lovey. Yeah my linner ain't till 3 so yeee
Yeah but mines at 2 so you'd have to leave?
Yeah I know it's all good. Still okay you have no car?
Yeah that's fine as long as you come get me at some point hah
I wanna go to Seattle alread
Hah I know. And me too! Want it to snow as well hehe. Wish my family was as good as you at shopping for me heh. Mrah want your sweater to be here!
Oh you got me a sweater huh?
When will you come
Hahahah fuxk... Well damn it I'm stupid :( meh gah. And be home in twenty and then to you. So say 1230?
Meh...okay well hurry I guess idk it doesn't take 40 minutes to get here
I'll go fast just wana be earlier Than later from what I tell you. And I suck
Now I ruined Xmas
No I feel poopy
I don't wanna go to Stefan's I don't wanna do anything I wanna go get coffee
We can make coffee? And go get some? Lovey what's wrong?
Johnny it's okay
I just am a stupid kitty. And will hugs help?
Okay but fuck it was your last present and mish meh supposed to be a surprise. Poopsicle.
Idk what's wrong
It's okay Johnny I don't mind okay? (: and yeah
I know and you suck an it was an accident an I was laughing cuz it was funny STOP IT. Now. Okay? I'm not feeling good and it's not about the ducking present okay? Just hurry up
Okay I'm on my way home now lovey. Got it all good. Love you Sara
Love you come here
Showering now babe
Tell me when you leave
Okay about to leave. Need anything else? And enjoy
Also bein me your deodorant pleaseeeeeee
Onmy way
The Abercrombie shirt don't fit :(
I thought you were on your way? Where are you?
An it's okay baby
Here!
Yay come over
I love you Sara
I love you too Johnny (:
Enjoy linner babe (:
You too lovey :) hope you're doing better and wish I could have helped more
It's okay love I'll see you after (: I love you and hit me up after and well see what's up
Okay darling sounds good :) and hah Bella is stoked on Bowie
Awwwww (: pics and vids pleaseeeee
Haha well we are gonna let him sleepy tho. Later I will :) hi Stefan and everyone btw!
Okay but don't forget photos okay!!! He says hi and lemme know wassup lata
I won't :) and word will do! Enjoy lovey, and ciao for now corem ;)
Korem
I need you to come get me and take me home so I can poop
Babyyyyy
Hah what? And okay I'm sowy. How're you doing? Sorry music is playing from my phone.
Okay go have dinner sorry
It's okay. How're you? Still hanging out here. You done?
Well done with dinner and I'm all good go hang out sorry
Don't be sorry, and okay I'll hit you up inna bit lovey. Love you
We dunno what that means but sounds good
Love you 2
How're you doing? Think imma try and dip in like fifteen or so.
Yeahh sounds splendid
You okie? Sup?
I'm tired and blahrrrblahhhrrrr idk if gelato is open?
Are you okay? You didn't say dinner would be long so I was confused and shit
Sorry I've been in like a horrible mood all day and got in a fat fight with my dad and whatever. Sorry I'm a grinch on Christmas
It's okay lovey, we can be happy tonight okie. Jacuzzi bones coffee?
Hmph I wonder? I dk, call saffron and ask? Heh
Yeah I wanna know if gelato is open though cuz their number isn't working but it says they are.
Ahahaha you cheer me up :/
Not with that face?
It's just like you cheer me up a lot but no one else can the way you do
But let me know when you wanna leave, no rush babe okay?
You should just drive to gelato and see if it's open
Jk we found boba
Okay sounds good. ASAP after this game! And oh okie, which one?
Nvm yelp says everything is open but I don't think it is...
Nothing's open Mrah
Mrah poopy :( make coffee and jacuzzi?
I don't wanna stay here though babe
Okie lovey, well we can figure it out
I wanna get away from my dad you know it's just like god damn it
I'm sorry :/ was the party okay tho?
It was just food with our two families
Let me know when you come ciao
Okay I will. Mrah want this game to be over... And oh well that was okay though?
Yeah it's been 45 minutes.,,. And yeah
Clue doesn't take that long
Yeah I think my dad wants to head out too
Well it is love... Do you think I'm lying? And oh okay for sho
Hahah no! It's just annoying! Anyway you should jus come here and then we can go to a park or something and chill with Stefan and then go back to your house or something
Well play drunk clue on New Years but idk just guess the damn killer dude! Anyway ttyl
Hah okay I'm trying to win though! And oh okay sounds like a plan lovey :)
Kk
I luv chu
You too
Stefan and I are brainstorming how clue works cuz we forgot and attempting to figure out how it's taking you over an hour and our conclusion was that you guys don't know how to play either :p
10952 Martinique
Get off 15 at Mira Mesa, turn left and drive to parkdale, turn right on parkdale, left on wingsong, right on Martinique
Thanks
Nothing flavored
What's up?
Here
